body: A Zimbabwean student explains why a revolution in Zimbabwe is destined to fail: "Positing the possibility of a popular revolt in Zimbabwe is guardedly optimistic at best, wilfully naive at worst."
original_body: A Zimbabwean student explains why a revolution in Zimbabwe is destined to fail: "Positing the possibility of a popular revolt in Zimbabwe is guardedly optimistic at best, wilfully naive at worst."
title: Zimbabwe: Revolution in Zimbabwe will fail
